DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this investigation is to describe general safety profile of type II Diabetes Mellitus (DM) Japanese patients under exenatide therapy in real world medical practices.
DOC.brief_title: Specific Clinical Experience Investigation for Long-term Use of Exenatide (Byetta Subcutaneous Injection)
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Clinical Experience Investigation for long-term use of exenatide (Byetta subcutaneous injection).
DOC.criteria: Patient diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and who is naive patient with Byetta.
